document.heading: Tenant Opportunity to Purchase Notification Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-234, the “Tenant Opportunity to Purchase Notification Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-640 which was referred to the Committee on Housing and Urban Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 1, 2008, and July 15, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 28, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-475 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-234 became effective on October 21, 2008.
